function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ethical interaction capability in service SMEs","Impact":"Decreased trust and cooperation between service SMEs and customers, potential for unethical behavior","Mitigation":"Ethics training and guidelines for service SMEs, promoting transparent and fair processes","Technologies":"Ethical AI systems for decision-making and monitoring","People":"Service SMEs, customers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, industry associations"},{"Description":"Relational interactions during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential for disease transmission through close interactions","Mitigation":"Promotion of remote or contactless service delivery, implementation of sanitary and safety protocols","Technologies":"Video conferencing, remote collaboration tools, contactless payment systems","People":"Service SMEs, customers, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, service SMEs, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Nonopportunistic processes between actors in SMEs","Impact":"Risk of unfair advantage-taking and exploitation, potential for unethical business practices","Mitigation":"Clear guidelines for fair and transparent business processes, enforcement of anti-opportunistic regulations","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent transactions, AI for detecting opportunistic behavior","People":"Service SMEs, business partners","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, industry associations"}]}
